result.name: imported-veterinary-medicines
result.notes: A list of details of  the top 10 products for which Special Import Certificates were granted, naming the active ingredient and number of certificates.

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Imported veterinary medicines

extras.value: To be published on a quarterly basis on the Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) website , in the VMD's newsletter to the pharmaceutical industry and in the Vet Record.  N.B. - Our current understanding of the Veterinary Medicines Guidance Notes' requirements is that the product name should not be disclosed as this may constitute indirect advertising.
